plugins.name: Ant Design
plugins.description: A design system for enterprise-level products. Create an efficient and enjoyable work experience.

plugins.name: Styled Components
plugins.description: Utilising tagged template literals (a recent addition to JavaScript) and the power of CSS, styled-components allows you to write actual CSS code to style your components.

plugins.name: Styled System
plugins.description: Styled System is a collection of utility functions that add style props to your React components and allows you to control styles based on a global theme object with typographic scales, colors, and layout properties.

plugins.name: SWR
plugins.description: React Hooks library for data fetching from Vercel

plugins.name: React Query
plugins.description: Hooks for fetching, caching and updating asynchronous data in React.

plugins.name: react-use
plugins.description: A Collection of useful React hooks.

plugins.name: MobX
plugins.description: MobX is unopinionated and allows you to manage your application state outside of any UI framework.

plugins.name: MobX State Tree
plugins.description: MobX-State-Tree (also known as MST) is a state container system built on MobX, a functional reactive state library.

plugins.name: next-i18next
plugins.description: next-i18next is a plugin for Next.js projects that allows you to get translations up and running quickly and easily, while fully supporting SSR, multiple namespaces with codesplitting, etc.

plugins.name: ESLint
plugins.description: A pluggable and configurable linter tool for identifying and reporting on patterns in JavaScript. Maintain your code quality with ease.

plugins.name: Prettier
plugins.description: An opinionated code formatter; Supports many languages; Integrates with most editors.

plugins.name: lint-staged
plugins.description: The concept of lint-staged is to run configured linter (or other) tasks on files that are staged in git.

plugins.name: Testing Library
plugins.description: The React Testing Library is a very light-weight solution for testing React components. It provides light utility functions on top of react-dom and react-dom/test-utils.

plugins.name: Webdriver IO
plugins.description: Next-gen browser and mobile automation test framework for Node.js.

plugins.name: Github Actions
plugins.description: GitHub Actions makes it easy to automate all your software workflows, now with world-class CI/CD. Build, test, and deploy your code right from GitHub.
